metadata.title: CVE-2021-28904 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: In function ext_get_plugin() in libyang <= v1.0.225, it doesn't check whether the value of revision is NULL. If revision is NULL, the operation of strcmp(revision, ext_plugins[u].revision) will lead to a crash.

criterions.comment: libyang package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
